subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour of California (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: After four days of chaos in cycling, spurred by the former Tour de France winner Floyd Landis’s doping allegations, Team HTC-Columbia celebrated after Michael Rogers won the Tour of California.
snippet: After four days of chaos in cycling, spurred by the former Tour de France winner Floyd Landis’s doping allegations, Team HTC-Columbia celebrated after Michael Rogers won the Tour of California.
